site.title: Twinkle AI
site.subtitle: Open-source Traditional Chinese LLM community from Taiwan

home.titleStart: Light up the starry sky of
home.lead: Twinkle AI is a community focused on building open-source Traditional Chinese language models. We bring together passionate contributors to implement, share, and drive the adoption of AI technologies in Taiwan.

optimized.title: Optimized for Traditional Chinese
optimized.description: We collect Traditional Chinese datasets and fine-tune LLaMA-like models to better fit Taiwan's local culture and usage.

open_source.title: Open & Collaborative
open_source.description: From datasets to model weights, we keep things open to lower barriers and encourage community contributions.

tools.title: Evaluation & Tools
tools.description: We develop Twinkle Eval and TwinRAD to provide efficient and accurate model evaluation and red-team testing frameworks.

projects.title: Open-source projects
projects.lead: We commit to open-source all our research outputs, including model weights, training data, and evaluation tools.

hf.title: Hugging Face models
hf.lead: Popular models by us on Hugging Face.
